author: barnabasbusa
content:
If anyone wants to start testing devnet 4 spec - we have prepared a [PR](https://github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-package/pull/798) on ethereum-package (which now also adds support for fulu fork trigger).  - PR expected to be merged once we see a timeline for devnet 4 launch, but wouldn't want to break master for devnet 3 testing. 

If you want to use the updated contracts and test anything with devnet 4, please use `kurtosis run github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-package@bbusa/fulu ...`
